text: Victor Henry Elford (10 June 1935 â€“ 13 March 2022) was an English sports car racing, rallying and Formula One driver. He took part in 13 World Championship F1 Grands Prix, debuting on 7 July 1968. Elford died on 13 March 2022, at the age of 86 from cancer. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from London Category:People from Peckham Category:Deaths from cancer
